headline: Mem0 Raises $24M Series A to Build Memory Layer for AI Agents
summary: Mem0, a memory infrastructure platform for AI agents, today announced $24M in funding: a Seed led by Kindred Ventures and Series A led by Basis Set Ventures, with participation from Peak XV Partners, GitHub Fund, and Y Combinator. The round includes strategic investments from technology leaders Scott Belsky and Dharmesh Shah, alongside CEOs of top infrastructure companies including Datadog, Supabase, PostHog, ex-GitHub, and Weights & Biases.
